Title: Establishes the public water justice act
Summary: Establishes the public water justice act; prohibits sale of waters of the state unless otherwise specifically authorized; establishes a public water justice fund for royalties and fees collected from persons or entities authorized to sell waters of the state.
LawCode: Amd §15-0109, add Art 15 Title 35 §§15-3501 - 15-3513, En Con L; add §99-qq, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the public water justice act
